snippet.title: Bendy and the Ink Machine: Chapter 3 ENHANCEMENTS COMING SOON!!!
snippet.description:
Something's new in Chapter 3 soon! Hurry! Get Bendy and the Ink Machine Chapter 3 on Steam NOW to see the original version before it’s gone forever!  https://bit.ly/2yZdgLz

The free update is coming when Chapter 4 hits! Be ready!

https://www.BendyandtheInkMachine.com
